item.title: Continuous Versioning with Maven
item.description: To automatically version Maven projects, I like to use the m-versions-p like this: $ mvn versions:set -DnewVersion=my.new.version -DgenerateBackupPoms=false This will update the version property of every module in the reactor to prepare them for the next release. In case you are using GitHub Actions, consider using a timestamp.
